text:
Claude Goretta (23 June 1929 – 20 February 2019) was a Swiss television producer and movie director. His 1973 movie "L'Invitation" was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film. His 1981 movie "La provinciale" was entered into the 31st Berlin International Film Festival. He was born in Geneva.
Goretta died on 20 February 2019 in Geneva at the age of 89.

annotations.surface_form: Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film
